name: presterjohn
text: If you think 'customer' isn't much of an insult you haven't worked retail.

name: d-pad
text: Truer words were never spoken.

name: u235
text: Yeah, in that instance the recipient may not feel it, but that usage of the word "customer" holds a lot more bile and venom than even the filthiest swears.

name: stuart
text: But... but he underlined it and everything!

text: I always liked cuntstomer when I worked at a servo.

text: That crudely-drawn penis represents Roast Beef's hope for the future.

text: Zomtimes, Dr. House, a ding-dong iss choost a ding-dong.

name: unfun
text:
If it was a dream and it wasn't real
How'd I get a jersey with the name O'Neal?

name: charchar
text: I love how it doesn't stoop so low as to call him 'asshole' or some suchlike.  Way to keep it classy, Cash-Register-Person.

name: rational
text: All these years I have been saying "Up yours customer!" and only now do I remember why. I don't usually draw the lightning c0q tho.

name: berami
text: Are those electric lines, stink lines or both? Either way, that dong is just furious !

name: whoper
text:
I was walking around Foster City today when I saw a restaurant called the Lotus Garden, with its name in the exact same typeface used for Jade Garden here. Suffice to say I did a double-take.

Of course, when I got home I Googled Jade Garden and found that there were like 20 actual restaurants called Jade Garden. I live in fear of these restaurants.

name: straw
text: There was a Jade Garden in Ithaca when I went there.  They were pretty all right!  No ding dongs or anything!

name: stereo
text: The Jade Garden near where I live (no more than 2 blocks away) shut down due to lack of business. A friend of mine used to waitress there and she assured me the ding dongs were furious .

name: bobbieluvsya
text: I like to think that the lack of customers was caused by Achewood. Up yours, people who work at restaurants.

name: jonmw
text: oh you mean these eyes

name: theguitarhero
text:
You mean the eyes that I...


BONED??!

name: zapatos
text: THESE EYES!

name: aelindil
text: My heart's explodin'!

name: mikeronomicon
text: The only drawing of a ding-dong I've seen that was more furious was the penisaurus rex my buddy drew. It spits on it's prey.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: she was so down.

name: kotoku
text: Molly. The best thing that ever happened to Roast Beef.

name: dusty
text: Hey Pittsburgh how are you, were the Megafurious ding-dongs, this is the second song from our third album, its called laser-jizz...

name: mashisoyo
text: The desolation of the fifth panel, where Beef has to face the idea that his perfect lady was just a dream, it haunts me. His eyes show us a vast, empty desert of loneliness and loss.

name: pardalote
text: I'm loving Ray's little butt crack in the first panel. Even if it's above his tail, and hence has no right to be there, it still made me smile.
